name: UpdateListName
description:
Update the name of a CRM list in HubSpot.

Call this tool to update the name of a CRM list in HubSpot, ensuring the new name is globally unique.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ILS ID of the list to update.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to update.

parameters.name: new_list_name
parameters.description: The new name for the CRM list. It must be globally unique relative to other public lists.

value_schema.description: The name to update the list to.

parameters.name: include_filter_branch_definition
parameters.description: Set to true to include filter branch definitions in the response list definition, or false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: listName
parameters.description: The name to update the list to.

value_schema.description: The name to update the list to.

parameters.name: includeFilters
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

value_schema.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to update.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to update.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
